parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty gas cap can cause the engine light to come on, leading to unnecessary repairs and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Engine light comes on
gas cap is not loose
but dealer claims it is loose
gas cap clicks 4 times to ensure tightness.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The constant illumination of the check engine light can be a nuisance and may indicate a more serious underlying issue, potentially affecting vehicle performance and safety.
symptoms: Check engine light comes on
dealer cannot determine cause or code
light comes on and goes off intermittently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty exhaust system can lead to loud noises, decreased performance, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Loudness in the exhaust
broken catalytic converter
exhaust smoke.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission and engine problems can cause safety risks, decreased performance, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Vehicle would not shift out of first gear
engine replacement
transmission replacement
major oil leak.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission problems can cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leading to safety risks and inconvenience.
symptoms: Delayed or harsh shifting
grinding noise
whistling or whining noise during deceleration
vibration in the driveline and on the floor of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the front axle assembly can cause a clunking noise when backing, leading to safety risks and potential loss of control.
symptoms: Clunking noise when backing
grinding noise from the front wheels.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the driveline can cause the transmission to fail, leading to safety risks and potential loss of control.
symptoms: Knocking noise from the rear end
transmission failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries to occupants and pedestrians.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
surges forward
or accelerates at a high speed without pressing the gas pedal
often when removing foot from the brake pedal or when starting the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An erratic idle speed can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The engine RPMs race to high levels (over 2000) and then decline to a higher-than-normal idle speed (around 1500)
staying at this speed for an extended period. The vehicle may also move forward without pressing the gas pedal
often when pulling out of a parking space.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden cracking or shattering of the windshield can cause loss of visibility, accidents, and injuries to occupants.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters without any apparent impact or debris
often in an "S" shaped pattern
and can occur on either the driver's or passenger's side.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of power windows can cause injuries, especially to children, if they become stuck or trapped.
symptoms: Power windows continue to operate even when the vehicle is turned off and the key is removed from the ignition
and windows can shatter or explode without any apparent cause.
